page.title: 09COUNTING RHYMES
page.content:
"MANDY" This is one of our counting out rhymes.It is called "Mandy" and this is it:- Milly, Molly, Mandy, sweet as sugar candy, one two three you're it.
"SPUDS" This is how we count out. It is called "Spuds". You go:- 1 potato, 2 potato, 3 potato, 4. 5 potato, 6 potato, 7 potato more. You have to put your fists into a circle and you tap the top of the fist when you say more. Whichever fist it lands on is put behind that person's back. The counting rhyme continues until there is only one fist left in. The person whose fist it is, is the first catcher or chaser in the game to be played. We say that he or she is "it".
